data.title: If you like spicy, you'll simply Love Sweetie Thai
data.text:
While visiting Grand Rapids, MI for Mother's Day, My wife and daughter began searching for a place to have dinner. Always looking to try something different, Sweetie Thai was chosen and we weren't disappointed. My wife had the vegetarian Curry Pad Thai, my daughter had the chicken Pad See Ew, and I ordered the Sweetie Thai Pork. Each entree was surprisingly deliciously seasoned to taste. Even more surprising was the generous servings: it is very rare that I can't finish an entree. It was great having a chance to again savor the meal from earlier that afternoon. If you really like spicy food,  I'd suggest you begin at level 3/5 and advance or retreat from there. I had a chance to
taste my daughter's Mango and Sticky Rice, which was also delicious and, (in my view), a great Thai version of rice pudding. My compliments to chef Victoria!

data.title: Wonderful fresh food, exciting menu!!
data.text: What a great place!  Not very big, just a few tables and take-out, but man!!  The employees are very friendly and obviously very proud of this Thai restaurant.  Great fresh food, very clean, brightly decorated.  Loved it!!

data.title: Great Thai!!!
data.text: Very hot! Even the lowest choice, 1 out of 5 was quite hot...  Very clean - the cleanest restaurant I have been in in ages!

data.title: Top notch Thai food
data.text:
The food here is some of the best Thai that I have had.  There heat scale is a bit hotter than I am accustomed to and I love hot food so just be aware.
Got to say their chicken wings, I know not really Thai, but got to say are so good. They were deep fried then tossed in a sauce but got to say some of the best ever.

data.title: Amazing, Fresh, and Friendly!
data.text:
It is beyond me that this restaurant hasn't been reviewed yet. This place is the absolute best Thai food I have had in Grand Rapids. The Lap Gai (Chicken Salad) with sticky rice is a great lunch and never disappoints me.

The staff are super friendly and ready to make recommendations to you. Thank you Sweetie Thai for such delicious, fresh food!
